product_name: REI  Mini Travel Surge Protector with Dual USB Ports
long_description: The REI Mini Travel Surge Protector with Dual USB provides two outlets and two USB ports. It charges your smartphone, MP3 player, iPad and tablet while protecting them from electrical surges.
short_description: The REI Mini Travel Surge Protector with Dual USB provides two outlets and two USB ports. It charges your smartphone, MP3 player, iPad and tablet while protecting them from electrical surges.
